statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_campaign WHERE platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT campaign_id, platform FROM social_media_campaign ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaign WHERE shares_count > 100 ORDER BY shares_count ASC;
SELECT platform, campaign_id FROM social_media_campaign WHERE shares_count < 50;
SELECT campaign_id, shares_count, platform FROM social_media_campaign ORDER BY shares_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaign WHERE shares_count > 100 ORDER BY platform ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, platform FROM social_media_campaign WHERE platform='Twitter' AND shares_count < 50 ORDER BY shares_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, platform, shares_count FROM social_media_campaign WHERE shares_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT platform, shares_count FROM social_media_campaign WHERE platform='Facebook' ORDER BY shares_count DESC, platform;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaign WHERE platform='Instagram' AND shares_count > 200 ORDER BY shares_count ASC, platform DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_platforms;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Twitter';
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT platform_id, COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM campaign_metrics GROUP BY platform_id;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platforms ORDER BY platform_type DESC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE platform_id = 2 ORDER BY shares_count DESC;
SELECT platform_name, COUNT(platform_id) AS total_count FROM social_media_platforms GROUP BY platform_name;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Social';

SELECT platform_name, platform_type, shares_count FROM social_media_platforms JOIN campaign_metrics ON social_media_platforms.platform_id = campaign_metrics.platform_id WHERE shares_count > 100 ORDER BY shares_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_platforms;
SELECT platform_name FROM social_media_platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Social';
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT share_id, post_id, share_count FROM shares WHERE share_count > 100;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platforms;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE platform_id = 2 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT s.share_count, p.post_content, p.post_date FROM shares s JOIN social_media_posts p ON s.post_id = p.post_id WHERE s.share_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT platform_name, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM social_media_posts p JOIN social_media_platforms s ON p.platform_id = s.platform_id GROUP BY platform_name ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, platform FROM social_media_campaign ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shares FROM facebook_shares GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, share_count FROM social_media_campaign WHERE platform='twitter';
SELECT * FROM instagram_shares ORDER BY share_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaign WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT campaign_name, share_count FROM social_media_campaign WHERE share_count > 100 ORDER BY share_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, platform, share_count FROM social_media_campaign WHERE share_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY platform ASC, campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, user_id, share_time FROM facebook_shares WHERE share_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY share_time DESC;

SELECT campaign_id, platform, COUNT(*) AS total_shares FROM social_media_campaign JOIN instagram_shares ON social_media_campaign.campaign_id = instagram_shares.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id, platform ORDER BY total_shares DESC;
SELECT * FROM platform_shares LIMIT 5
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, shares_count FROM platform_shares WHERE shares_count > 100 ORDER BY shares_count DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT ad_platform_id, platform_name, ad_spend FROM ad_platforms WHERE ad_spend > 500 ORDER BY ad_spend DESC
SELECT * FROM platform_shares WHERE shares_count > 100 ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT platform_name, ad_spend FROM ad_platforms WHERE ad_spend BETWEEN 1000.00 AND 5000.00 ORDER BY ad_spend ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, user_id, share_date FROM campaign_shares WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY share_date DESC;
